review: Fire stick exceeded my expectations - I plan on taking it on a trip soon and am sure it will work great.
author: Robert (Bob) Capp

review: I love the fire stick!! It's totally amazing and has exceeded all of my expectations. I like how the stick categories from the apps to music to movies etc. It's so fun to play with.
author: Lisa Hansel

review: For some reason it keeps buffering every once in awhile. Don't know why. Anyone know??
author: DANE

review: I really love the fire stick.  It is user friendly and easy to set up.  I like this better than my smart tv.  With fire stick when my shows on huluplus have a new episode it shows me.
author: Karen Pate

review: Works great and we love it! Lots of options!
author: Andrea V.

review: Excellent!  My daughter has not stopped watching movies and TV shows since we got it.
author: Barbara H. Oliver

review: Amazon Fire Stick works well, easy plug & play install (HDMI into tv and power plug into wall). HD works well even on lower bandwidth comcast cable. Fire TV Stick replaced my Apple TV.
author: Brian M. Schoedel "Brian Schoedel"
